class.name: VideoStreamMPG
class.description: [VideoStream] resource handling the MPEG-1 video format with [code].mpg[/code] extension. The MPEG-1 codec is decoded on the CPU. [b]Note:[/b] The decoders expects [code].mpg[/code] files to have a MPEG-1 video stream and a MPEG-1 Audio Layer II audio stream. Other types can't be decoded.
